description:
Travel back in time, with this game that will remind you how important it is to have courage to face the adversities that come your way.
Throughout action-color scenarios, meet Pichi , a blue penguin who thanks to his small size and incredible swimming ability has been sent on an adventure to return home.
With  lovely and original pixel art mixed with music comes directly from the portable device, explore impossible worlds for a penguin, from a hot desert to a coral reef, fight enemies, solve puzzles and take on Nanuk, the pirate polar bear that attacked your ship.
Pocket Penguin DX on Nintendo Switchâ„¢ have extra features:
- New Mini Games 
- New color palettes (up to 19)
- 3 Modes of difficulty.
-  Costumes
- Play in portable mode to experience the real deal.

Pocket Penguin DX, without a doubt, a platformer adventure that will remind you of the portable device era.
name: Pocket Penguin DX: A Retro Style Adventure
intro: A retro style videogame that tell us the story of a blue penguin that got lost in the sea after the attack of a pirate ship.
